card.name: Giganima, the Reaper
card.text: ■ When you put one of your other creatures that have "Reaper" in their Card Name

card.name: Wiz, White Knight Enlightener
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has "Blocker". ■ Double Breaker ■ Ignore any effects that would prevent your creatures that have "blocker" from attacking your opponent. ■ End Step

card.name: Ken Gou, Crimson Lord ~The Sundering~
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Wan Ken, Crimson Lord in its name. ■ Soulshift ■ Double Breaker ■ Tap Ability

card.name: Ken, Crimson Lord ~Playing with Water~
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. ■ Tap Ability

card.name: Deathraios, Cursed Blade Reaper
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures that has "Reaper" in its name. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Grave Robber Reaper Man
card.text: ■ Whenever your other creatures that have "Reaper" in their name are destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Deathproof, Shadow Reaper
card.text: ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have "Reaper" in their names gets "slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)''

card.name: Bone Amigo, the Undead Reaper
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack.

card.name: The Strong Spiral
card.text: ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone, and return it to its owner's hand. ■ If you have a creature in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Peace Lupia
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Rising NEX, the Enlightened
card.text: ■ Ultimate Evolution—Put on one of your evolution Armored Dragons or evolution Fire Birds. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone that has the lowest power and destroys it. ■ God Slayer ''(Whenever this creature battles a God, destroy the God after the battle.)'' ■ Triple Breaker ■ When this creature is destroyed, your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone that has the lowest power and destroys it. Then destroy your creature in the battle zone that has the lowest power. Then you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Kuragen
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an evolution creature from it and show it to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck and put the chosen card on top of your deck.

card.name: Toppa Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever a creature that has "NEX" in its name battles, you may destroy this creature. If you do, untap that creature and it wins the battle.

card.name: Pangaea Moon, the Enlightened
card.text: ■ Ultimate evolution—Put on one of your evolution creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever you summon a non-evolution creature during your turn, search your deck. You may choose any number of cards from your deck that have the same name as that creature and put them into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Kaiser Wing Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Break Bonus

card.name: Lunar Kuroro
card.text: ■ Each creature in the battle zone gets "slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "Slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ Whenever your Dragons attack, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Asura, the Great Enigma
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Giants. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add one of those cards into your shields face down, one into your mana zone, and one into your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Corteo, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Necrodragon Czar Gandhi
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a creature that has power 6000 or more from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Drain Worm, the Parasite
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -1000 power until the End Step

card.name: Piara Heart
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 1000 or less.
